name: Bean Kingdom
description:
https://www.coregames.com/games/62581c/bean-kingdom

The internet has become obsessed with Beans to the point where Beans have become so powerful they've literally taken over the human race. It is up to you to defeat the Bean King and tame the beans back to the meme we call the internet.

Say HI to our discord! https://discord.gg/vMpfwDBrnZ
